title: Unable to purchase nemesis jax chromas
body: I don't see the nemesis jax individual chromas available in the store. I do own nemesis jax and Jax, but they aren't showing up for me at all.

replies.body: There's currently an issue with the Nemesis Jax chroma, so individual sales are currently down.  I don't have an eta just now, but we'll be posting updates on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Hang tight!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GabiOhrv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-26T16:24:47.029+0000)
>
> There's currently an issue with the Nemesis Jax chroma, so individual sales are currently down.  I don't have an eta just now, but we'll be posting updates on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Hang tight!

If the issue isn't resolved before the sale ends, will he be put on sale after the fact?
It is [disabled ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na)due to a bug.  Hopefully they get it fixed soon.

> [{quoted}](name=Lew,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GabiOhrv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-26T03:50:22.278+0000)
>
> It is [disabled ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na)due to a bug.  Hopefully they get it fixed soon.

Thanks for the heads up. I guess i'll save my ip for when he hopefully gets reenabled.
